project.component: { "keyToString": { "ASKED_SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "Attach to Unity Editor.Attach to Unity Editor.executor": "Debug", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "develop", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "preferences.pluginManager", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" } }

component.name: RunManager
component.selected: Attach to Unity Editor.Attach to Unity Editor

task.summary:
Remove FireFliesRed 1 prefab
Deleted FireFliesRed 1.prefab from Assets/Particles/UsefulParticles/Death directory. This file was no longer necessary and its removal helps clean up the project.

Delete unused AttackCritter prefab and update various scripts.
Removed the AttackCritter prefab and associated metadata from the project as it is no longer in use. Updated several scripts for better player transformation handling and minor fixes in projectile pool references. Enhanced the TechController to include debugging outputs and null checks before activating techs.
Fixed building damage, weapons particles, and git effects. Need to update sorting layers for weapons

Refactor Mine class and add new assets
Refactored the Mine class to inherit from Projectile and removed unnecessary fields. Added new assets: GroundFire prefab and CritterBite ScriptableObject. This improves the organization and modularity of customization in the game.

Refactor Mine class and add new assets
Refactored the Mine class to inherit from Projectile and removed unnecessary fields. Added new assets: GroundFire prefab and CritterBite ScriptableObject. This improves the organization and modularity of customization in the game.

Refactor Mine class and add new assets
Refactored the Mine class to inherit from Projectile and removed unnecessary fields. Added new assets: GroundFire prefab and CritterBite ScriptableObject. This improves the organization and modularity of customization in the game.

Remove House.prefab and update WorldObjects prefabs
Deleted House.prefab file and made structural changes to integrate house components directly within the WorldObjects prefab. This simplifies the hierarchy and improves maintainability of the asset configuration.

Add new Obstacle prefabs for House, Roof, and Door
This commit introduces new prefabs for a House, Roof, and Door, which are part of the Obstacle category. They include detailed configurations for transformations, physics, and sprite rendering to enable proper obstacle dynamics and interactions in the game. These prefabs are crucial for expanding the variety of interactive elements within the game environment.

Refactor asset sprites and add sorting scripts
Renamed and reorganized sprite assets for better structure within the project. Updated project settings to enhance gizmo visibility and created new scripts for dynamic Y-axis sorting of objects and lights.

Add DeathBlade prefab to the DeathRays directory
This commit introduces the DeathBlade prefab with all necessary components and configurations into the DeathRays directory. This addition includes detailed settings for light, transform, MonoBehaviour components, and spline data for the DeathBlade object.

Update TinySparkle prefab particle system settings
Adjusted various particle system settings including color gradients and looping behavior. Added new properties such as color space and custom emitter velocity for enhanced visuals.

Add AcidBloodSpash and BloodExplosionRed particle prefabs
Created AcidBloodSpash and BloodExplosionRed prefabs in the Particles folder. The AcidBloodSpash has specified transform properties and attributes, while BloodExplosionRed comes with complete particle system settings including initial modules and emissions.

Remove unused audio files and update weapon scripts
Deleted several unused audio files including enemy SFX and music tracks. Updated weapon scripts to play projectile SFX and adjusted settings for the Mutagenic Nanites weapon. This cleanup and enhancement will optimize project resources and improve gameplay experience.
added MMF_Players for most sound categories.

Add new audio files for SFX and music
Added a comprehensive set of new audio files including sound effects, music tracks, and character vocalizations. This enhances the project's audio resources, improving the overall sound quality and variety within the game. Each file is correctly imported and configured with appropriate metadata.

Remove obsolete audio files
Deleted numerous obsolete audio files to clean up the project directory. This includes various attack, movement, and vocal sound effects that are no longer in use.

Remove unused audio file and scene.
Deleted an unused audio file "Waiting_game(loop).wav" and removed the MainCorridorScene.unity. These files were no longer necessary and their removal helps in cleaning up the project directory.
Added Cube start sequence, added title screen and scene loading logic for the first level.

Refactor audio file structure and remove unused assets.
Renamed audio files for better consistency and organization under the WeaponsSfx directory. Deleted unused aaSlime.wav audio file and several unused meta files to clean up the project's assets. Updated workspace and level scene data to reflect changes in asset usage and improve project organization.
Added Enemy, weapon, and damage type generic sound effect controllers.

MESSAGE.value:
Remove FireFliesRed 1 prefab
Deleted FireFliesRed 1.prefab from Assets/Particles/UsefulParticles/Death directory. This file was no longer necessary and its removal helps clean up the project.

Delete unused AttackCritter prefab and update various scripts.
Removed the AttackCritter prefab and associated metadata from the project as it is no longer in use. Updated several scripts for better player transformation handling and minor fixes in projectile pool references. Enhanced the TechController to include debugging outputs and null checks before activating techs.

Add BiteHit particle effect prefab
This commit adds a new particle effect prefab named BiteHit, located at Assets/Particles/UsefulParticles/BiteHit.prefab. The prefab includes configuration for particle system properties such as particle lifetime, emission rate, and start conditions. This new particle effect can be used to enhance visual feedback for bite actions in the game.
Fixed building damage, weapons particles, and git effects. Need to update sorting layers for weapons

Refactor Mine.cs and add new assets
Refactored `Mine.cs` to extend `Projectile` class and updated existing code for clarity and efficiency. Added new ground fire particle prefab and CritterBite scriptable object asset.

Add GroundFire prefab and CritterBite scriptable object
Introduced a new GroundFire particle effect prefab under Obstacles/UsefulParticles. Additionally, added a CritterBite asset for tech weapons, complete with essential configuration details.

Refactor Mine class and add new assets
Refactored the Mine class to inherit from Projectile and removed unnecessary fields. Added new assets: GroundFire prefab and CritterBite ScriptableObject. This improves the organization and modularity of customization in the game.

Remove House.prefab and update WorldObjects prefabs
Deleted House.prefab file and made structural changes to integrate house components directly within the WorldObjects prefab. This simplifies the hierarchy and improves maintainability of the asset configuration.

Add new Obstacle prefabs for House, Roof, and Door
This commit introduces new prefabs for a House, Roof, and Door, which are part of the Obstacle category. They include detailed configurations for transformations, physics, and sprite rendering to enable proper obstacle dynamics and interactions in the game. These prefabs are crucial for expanding the variety of interactive elements within the game environment.

Refactor asset sprites and add sorting scripts
Renamed and reorganized sprite assets for better structure within the project. Updated project settings to enhance gizmo visibility and created new scripts for dynamic Y-axis sorting of objects and lights.

Add DeathBlade prefab to the DeathRays directory
This commit introduces the DeathBlade prefab with all necessary components and configurations into the DeathRays directory. This addition includes detailed settings for light, transform, MonoBehaviour components, and spline data for the DeathBlade object.

Update TinySparkle prefab particle system settings
Adjusted various particle system settings including color gradients and looping behavior. Added new properties such as color space and custom emitter velocity for enhanced visuals.

Add AcidBloodSpash and BloodExplosionRed particle prefabs
Created AcidBloodSpash and BloodExplosionRed prefabs in the Particles folder. The AcidBloodSpash has specified transform properties and attributes, while BloodExplosionRed comes with complete particle system settings including initial modules and emissions.

Remove unused audio files and update weapon scripts
Deleted several unused audio files including enemy SFX and music tracks. Updated weapon scripts to play projectile SFX and adjusted settings for the Mutagenic Nanites weapon. This cleanup and enhancement will optimize project resources and improve gameplay experience.
added MMF_Players for most sound categories.

Add new audio files for SFX and music
Added a comprehensive set of new audio files including sound effects, music tracks, and character vocalizations. This enhances the project's audio resources, improving the overall sound quality and variety within the game. Each file is correctly imported and configured with appropriate metadata.

Remove obsolete audio files
Deleted numerous obsolete audio files to clean up the project directory. This includes various attack, movement, and vocal sound effects that are no longer in use.
Added cube game start intro, added titlescreen, added start area of crater.

Remove unused audio file and scene.
Deleted an unused audio file "Waiting_game(loop).wav" and removed the MainCorridorScene.unity. These files were no longer necessary and their removal helps in cleaning up the project directory.
Added Cube start sequence, added title screen and scene loading logic for the first level.

Refactor audio file structure and remove unused assets.
Renamed audio files for better consistency and organization under the WeaponsSfx directory. Deleted unused aaSlime.wav audio file and several unused meta files to clean up the project's assets. Updated workspace and level scene data to reflect changes in asset usage and improve project organization.
Added Enemy, weapon, and damage type generic sound effect controllers.
